data.title: How To Become An Oracle Functional Consultant: What It Is and Career Path
meta_keywords: how to become an Oracle Functional Consultant
data.meta_description: Learn what an oracle functional consultant is, what they do, and how to become one. Role overview, definition, salary and skills for oracle functional consultants
data.text:
The educational requirements for an oracle functional consultant are a combination of formal education and certifications. According to industry experts, a bachelor's degree in computer science, electrical engineering, business, accounting, or computer engineering is often preferred. Additionally, certifications such as the Oracle Certified Associate - Oracle9i Database Administrator, Oracle B2B Service 2021 Certified Implementation Specialist Certification, and Oracle Certified Professional - Oracle 9i Database Administrator can significantly enhance the prospects of a candidate. While a high school diploma or a certificate program can provide a basic understanding, an associate's or master's degree is more common in this field. Top schools known for producing successful oracle functional consultants include Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Stanford University, Harvard University, Duke University, and the University of Pennsylvania.

Oracle functional consultants use a variety of skills on a day-to-day basis. They gather requirements and design reports and forms, defining users and assigning responsibilities. They also develop and test scripts, configure quality, and implement logical apps. They manage all phases of testing to ensure that test plans and cases are completed and business requirements are met. Other skills include configuring setups, creating custom enhancements, and direct end-user support for Oracle e-business suite applications.

Oracle functional consultants are responsible for gathering requirements, designing reports and forms, and defining users and assigning responsibilities. They also deliver functional Oracle e-business suite consulting services and support, specifically in the procure-to-pay process. They work on requirement gathering, developing custom reports, and providing inputs to technical consultants for developing reports. They also configure necessary solutions and conduct knowledge transfer sessions with clients to support ongoing maintenance.

When your background is strong enough, you can start writing your oracle functional consultant resume.

You can use Zippia's AI resume builder to make the resume writing process easier while also making sure that you include key information that hiring managers expect to see on an oracle functional consultant resume. You'll find resume tips and examples of skills, responsibilities, and summaries, all provided by Zippi, your career sidekick.
